statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.BankName , AA.AccountNo , AA.Depositor , AA.ImageID , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TBankAccount AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TBankAccount AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBankAccount ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, BankName, AccountNo, Depositor, ImageID, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #BankName#, #AccountNo#, #Depositor#, #ImageID#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBankAccount SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , BankName = #BankName# , AccountNo = #AccountNo# , Depositor = #Depositor# , ImageID = #ImageID# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
